-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                       Description
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Avalanche The White Death tells the stories of some of those lucky enough to 
escape this feared mountain phenomenon. Hear first hand accounts from survivors 
from avalanches around the world.

The film takes viewers to Nepal, Austria, Utah and Alaska to reveal the 
catastrophe and horror of being caught in the path of such a force of nature.
